charts: Avg deaths per day (Higher the better)
select  floor(count(*) /(max(date(timelog)) -min(date(timelog)) +1)) avg_death_per_day ,surveyor from death group by surveyor
Avg Narrative Length in chars (Higher the better)
select  FLOOR(avg(length(summary))) avg_narrative_length,surveyor from narrative a left join death b on a.deathId=b.deathId where surveyor is not null group by surveyor
select count(*) complete_interviews,surveyor from feedback group by surveyor
select count(*) invalid_mobile_number,surveyor from household where contactNo='99999999' or secContactNo='99999999' group by surveyor
select count(*) total_deaths,surveyor from death group by surveyor order by count(*)
select FLOOR(avg(timestampdiff(MINUTE,b.starttime,b.endtime))) avg_time_in_min,surveyor from  deathDetail b left join death a on b.deathId=a.deathId group by a.surveyor
VA Interviews with No Symptoms(Lower the better)
select sum(if(instr(summary,'\"')=0,1,0)) va_interviews_with_no_symptom,surveyor from positiveSymptoms a left join death b on a.deathId=b.deathId where surveyor is not null   group by surveyor
